TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ClipboardProxy extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用於操作剪貼簿的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for manipulating the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使在應用程式關閉後，就會保存項目移動或複製到剪貼簿。Items moved or copied to the Clipboard persist even after the application is shut down. 剪貼簿上的資料可以是任何資料格式，也稱為 剪貼簿格式。Data on the Clipboard can be in any data format, also called a Clipboard format. 如需預先定義的格式，以使用 剪貼簿，請參閱。For a list of predefined formats to use with the Clipboard, see . 當移動或複製到剪貼簿項目時，則會清除其他格式中的項目。When an item is moved or copied to the Clipboard, items in other formats are cleared. 若要讓保存其他格式，請使用，也就是複製現有的目前的剪貼簿，包括從其他應用程式貼上的項目上的所有項目。To make other formats persist, use , which copies everything existing on the current Clipboard, including items pasted from other applications. 將資料放到最大可能目標的應用程式，其格式需求，您可能不知道，可以成功擷取的資料以多種格式剪貼簿上。Place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats to maximize the possibility that a target application, whose format requirements you might not know, can successfully retrieve the data. 因為所有的 Windows 應用程式共用系統剪貼簿，當您切換至另一個應用程式時，就可能會變更內容。Because all Windows applications share the system Clipboard, the contents may change when you switch to another application. 類別必須是可序列化，才能放在剪貼簿。A class must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 請參閱[序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f7570c09-7db5-44f2-983a-e8859caeb0d5)如需詳細資訊。See [Serialization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f7570c09-7db5-44f2-983a-e8859caeb0d5) for more information. 當遠端電腦上，存取剪貼簿除非存取執行緒會在 STA (單一執行緒 apartment) 模式下運作，否則會擲回。When accessing the Clipboard remotely, a is thrown unless the accessing thread operates in STA (single-threaded apartment) mode. 若要解決此問題，請設定`ThreadApartmentState`至`STA`。To resolve this issue, set the `ThreadApartmentState` to `STA`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 要儲存資料，以及從剪貼簿讀取](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/storing-data-to-and-reading-from-the-clipboard.md)。For more information, see [Storing Data to and Reading from the Clipboard](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/storing-data-to-and-reading-from-the-clipboard.md). ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會文字從剪貼簿讀取到字串`textOnClipboard`。This example reads text from the Clipboard into the string `textOnClipboard`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 如果剪貼簿上沒有任何文字，此範例將會失敗。This example will fail if there is no text on the Clipboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 清除 [剪貼簿]。

span.span: Clears the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別控制對剪貼簿，和存取相關聯列舉值指出存取層級。The class controls access to the Clipboard, and the associated enumeration value indicates the level of access. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms 中的其他安全性考量](~/docs/framework/winforms/additional-security-considerations-in-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Additional Security Considerations in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/additional-security-considerations-in-windows-forms.md). ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會清除剪貼簿。This example clears the Clipboard. ``` My.Computer.Clipboard.Clear() ``` 這會移除所有資料從剪貼簿。This removes all data from the Clipboard.

permission.span: 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

span.span: permission is required to access the system Clipboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance bool ContainsAudio() cil managed

summary.span: 指出剪貼簿是否包含音效資料。

span.span: Indicates whether the Clipboard contains audio data.

returns.span: 如果剪貼簿上儲存了音訊資料，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if audio data is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此範例會判斷 [剪貼簿] 是否包含音訊資料，並顯示結果。This example determines whether the Clipboard contains audio data and displays the result. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance bool ContainsData(string format) cil managed
Public Function ContainsData (format As String) As Boolean

param.name: format
param.span: 要檢查的自訂格式名稱。

Required.

summary.span: 指出 [剪貼簿] 是否包含指定自訂格式的資料。

span.span: Indicates whether the Clipboard contains data in the specified custom format.

returns.span: 如果 [剪貼簿] 上儲存了指定自訂格式的資料，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if data in the specified custom format is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您已經在剪貼簿上放置自訂格式化的資料，則這個方法可讓您檢查剪貼簿以供以該格式的資料。If you have placed custom formatted data on the Clipboard, this method allows you to check the Clipboard for data in that format. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會檢查資料自訂格式`specialFormat`。This example checks for data in the custom format `specialFormat`. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 取代`specialFormat`您想要檢查的自訂格式的名稱。Replace `specialFormat` with the name of the custom format you wish to check.

permission.span: 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

span.span: permission is required to access the system Clipboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance bool ContainsFileDropList() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回 ，指出 [剪貼簿] 是否包含檔案下拉清單。

span.span: Returns a indicating whether the Clipboard contains a file drop list.

returns.span: 如果檔案下拉清單儲存在剪貼簿，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a file drop list is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檔案下拉清單是包含檔案的路徑資訊的字串集合。A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此範例會判斷是否有檔案下拉清單到剪貼簿上，並將清單`ListBox.lstFiles`如果有的話。This example determines if there is a file drop list on the Clipboard and adds the list to the `ListBox.lstFiles` if they exist. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#12)] 此程式碼會建立例外狀況，如果沒有任何`ListBox`名為`lstFiles`。This code will create an exception if there is no `ListBox` named `lstFiles`.

permission.span: 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

span.span: permission is required to access the system Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此範例會查看如果剪貼簿上沒有映像，如果是的話，取得映像，並將它加入`PictureBox1`。This example checks to see if there is an image on the Clipboard and, if so, gets the image and adds it to `PictureBox1`. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 此範例會取決於是否存在`PictureBox`名為`PictureBox1`。This example depends on the existence of a `PictureBox` named `PictureBox1`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會讀取的資料格式`specialformat`從剪貼簿並將資料寫入至檔案。This example reads data in the format `specialformat` from the Clipboard and writes it to file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是進階的成員;它不會顯示在 IntelliSense 中除非您按一下 [**所有**] 索引標籤。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此範例會從剪貼簿中的形式，讀取資料然後將其寫入至檔案。This example reads data from the Clipboard in the form of an and then writes it to a file. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#1)] 取代`C:\mylogfile`具有您要寫入的檔案名稱。Replace `C:\mylogfile` with the name of the file to which you want to write.

permission.span: 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是僅適用於非伺服器應用程式。This method is available only for non-server applications. 檔案下拉清單是包含檔案的路徑資訊的字串集合。A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此範例會判斷是否有檔案下拉清單到剪貼簿上，並將清單`ListBox.lstFiles`如果有的話。This example determines if there is a file drop list on the Clipboard and adds the list to the `ListBox.lstFiles` if they exist. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#9)] 此程式碼會建立例外狀況，如果沒有任何`ListBox`名為`lstFiles`。This code creates an exception if there is no `ListBox` named `lstFiles`.

permission.span: 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

returns.span: 如果剪貼簿不包含任何 格式或可以轉換為該格式的資料，則為代表剪貼簿影像資料或 的 。

span.span: An representing the Clipboard image data or if the Clipboard does not contain any data that is in the format or can be converted to that format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會先確認剪貼簿上是否有影像，再擷取它，並將它指派給 `PictureBox1`。This example checks to see if there is an image on the Clipboard before retrieving it and assigning it to `PictureBox1`. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#4)] 此範例才能正確運作，必須有`PictureBox`名為`PictureBox1`您的表單上。For this example to function correctly, there must be a `PictureBox` named `PictureBox1` on your form.

permission.span: 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

span.span: permission is required to access the system Clipboard.

summary.span: 從 [剪貼簿] 擷取文字。

span.span: Retrieves text from the Clipboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance string GetText() cil managed

summary.span: 從 [剪貼簿] 擷取文字。

span.span: Retrieves text from the Clipboard.

returns.span: [剪貼簿] 文字資料，如果 [剪貼簿] 不包含 或 格式的文字資料 (依作業系統而定)，則為空字串。

span.span: The Clipboard text data or an empty string if the Clipboard does not contain data in the or format, depending on the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的格式為， ，和。Possible formats are , , and . ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會文字從剪貼簿讀取到字串`textOnClipboard`。This example reads text from the Clipboard into the string `textOnClipboard`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 如果剪貼簿上沒有任何文字，此範例中將會失敗。This example fails if there is no text on the Clipboard.

permission.span: 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

span.span: permission is required to access the system Clipboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance string GetText(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat format) cil managed
Public Function GetText (format As TextDataFormat) As String

param.name: format
param.span: 如果指定，則會識別所應擷取的文字格式。

span.span: If specified, identifies what text format should be retrieved.
Default is .
Required.

summary.span: 從 [剪貼簿] 擷取文字。

span.span: Retrieves text from the Clipboard.

returns.span: [剪貼簿] 文字資料，如果 [剪貼簿] 不包含所指定格式的資料，則為空字串。

span.span: The Clipboard text data or an empty string if the Clipboard does not contain data in the specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的格式為， ，和。Possible formats are , , and . ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會文字從剪貼簿讀取到字串`textOnClipboard`。This example reads text from the Clipboard into the string `textOnClipboard`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 如果剪貼簿上沒有任何文字，此範例中將會失敗。This example fails if there is no text on the Clipboard.

summary.span: 將音訊資料寫入至 [剪貼簿]。

span.span: Writes audio data to the Clipboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void SetAudio(unsigned int8[] audioBytes) cil managed

param.name: audioBytes

span.span: array.

param.span: 要寫入 [剪貼簿] 的音訊資料。

span.span: Audio data to be written to the Clipboard.
Required.

summary.span: 將音訊資料寫入至 [剪貼簿]。

span.span: Writes audio data to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為其他使用者可以存取剪貼簿，所以請不要使用它來儲存機密資訊，例如密碼或機密資料。Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會建立位元組陣列 `musicReader`，並在其中讀入檔案 `cool.wav`，然後將其寫入至剪貼簿。This example creates the byte array `musicReader`, reads the file `cool.wav` into it, and then writes it to the Clipboard. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#2)] 取代`cool.wav`與您想要讀取的檔案路徑與名稱。Replace `cool.wav` with the name and path of the file you wish to read.

permission.span: 權限，才能存取系統剪貼簿。

span.span: permission is required to access the system Clipboard.

Required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為其他使用者可以存取剪貼簿，所以請不要使用它來儲存機密資訊，例如密碼或機密資料。Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會建立位元組陣列 `musicReader`，並在其中讀入檔案 `cool.wav`，然後將其寫入至剪貼簿。This example creates the byte array `musicReader`, reads the file `cool.wav` into it, and then writes it to the Clipboard. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#2)] 取代`cool.wav`與您想要讀取的檔案路徑與名稱。Replace `cool.wav` with the name and path of the file you wish to read.

span.span: Format of data.
Required.

param.span: 要寫入 [剪貼簿] 的資料物件。

Required.

summary.span: 將自訂格式的資料寫入 [剪貼簿]。

span.span: Writes data in a custom format to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為其他使用者可以存取剪貼簿，所以請不要使用它來儲存機密資訊，例如密碼或機密資料。Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會以自訂格式 `specialFormat`，將 `DataObject.dataChunk` 寫入至剪貼簿。This example writes the `DataObject.dataChunk` to the Clipboard in the custom format `specialFormat`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 此範例中相依於自訂資料格式是否存在`specialFormat`。This example depends on the existence of the custom data format `specialFormat`.

summary.span: 將 寫入 [剪貼簿]。

span.span: Writes a to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是進階的成員;它不會顯示在 IntelliSense 中除非您按一下 [**所有**] 索引標籤。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為其他使用者可以存取剪貼簿，所以請不要使用它來儲存機密資訊，例如密碼或機密資料。Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此範例撰寫的資料物件`dataChunk`到剪貼簿。This example writes the data object `dataChunk` to the Clipboard. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#9)] 此範例會取決於資料物件是否存在`dataChunk`。This example depends on the existence of the data object `dataChunk`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void SetFileDropList(class System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection filePaths) cil managed

span.span: List of file names.
Required.

summary.span: 將表示檔案路徑的字串集合寫入 [剪貼簿]。

span.span: Writes a collection of strings representing file paths to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檔案下拉清單是表示檔案名稱的字串集合。A file drop list is a collection of strings representing file names. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為其他使用者可以存取剪貼簿，所以請不要使用它來儲存機密資訊，例如密碼或機密資料。Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會取得檔案名稱的集合**MyDocuments**、 將它轉換成檔案下拉清單，並將其寫入至剪貼簿。This example gets the collection of file names from **MyDocuments**, converts it to a file drop list, and writes it to the Clipboard. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#3)]
